label.phrase: at the same time we know that the deities want us to take care of ourselves to stand on our own two feet as individuals as families as a community as a nation

clusterList.phrase: at the same time we know that the deities want us to take care of ourselves to stand on our own two feet as individuals as families as a community as a nation
lord what things do i need to walk by faith in and not by sight
god has created us and brought us to our present position of power and strength for some great purpose
we are the captain of our own faith
to justify the ways of god to men
god disciplines us for our good that we may share in his holiness
the fundamental fact of existence is that this trust in god this faith is the firm foundation under everything that makes life worth living

i believe we each can find answers to divine questions if we look deeply in our own hearts and ask for guidance there although our answers may differ from the answers others have found they are our own and they will comfort us
so our pets whom we love and take care of should be treated as manifestations of the divine
in the situations i have witnessed there is no divine intervention all we have is each other we create our own problems and it us up to us to solve them
